Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Requires debt collection agencies to be licensed by the state
Summary: Requires debt collection agencies to be licensed by the state; requires bonding and allows for penalties.
LawCode: Add Art 7 §§295 - 300, Bank L; amd R3015, CPLR
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law and the civil practice law and rules, in relation to licensed consumer debt collectors
